Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Minuet in D major, KV 355/576b

c. 1790 · KV1,2 355 · KV3 594a · KV6 576b

[IMSLP]

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/2 · BA 4584-02 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Einzelstücke · ed. Wolfgang Plath [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Associated Board · Mature Piano Pieces · ed. Richard Jones [without trio]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5745 · Einzelstücke für Klavier · ed. Wolfgang Plath [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Henle · HN 133 · Klavierstücke / Auswahl · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [with trio by Maximilian Stadler]

Version without trio

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

Version with trio

The minuet is best known in combination with a trio later added by Maximilian Stadler.

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 2.5
